sentences: Oliver "Ollie" Riedel (born 11 April 1971) is a German musician, best known as the bassist for German Neue Deutsche HÃ¤rte band Rammstein.
Riedel was born in Schwerin on 11 April 1971.
Riedel was quite shy, especially during his teenage years; while his friends partied, he would often be found just "hanging around".
In 1990, at the age of 19, Riedel began playing in a folk/punk band called the Inchtabokatables.
In 1994, Riedel, Till Lindemann, Richard Kruspe, and Christoph Schneider entered and won the Berlin Senate Metro beat contest that allowed them to record a four-track demo professionally.
